sentences.sentence: It wasn't until I was 14 that I started playing football seriously when I was selected by Nacional DE Montevideo.
sentences.translation: 直到14岁时我才起头靠踢球赚钱，那时我被蒙得维的亚的平易近族队选中。

sentences.sentence: So far in my career, I have been very lucky; to play for Nacional, to play in the Copa Libertadores, to win the Copa America.
sentences.translation: 我的职业生涯至今都非常幸运，为民族队效力，踢了南美解放者杯，也赢得了美洲杯冠军。

sentences.sentence: El Nacional, a newspaper, hit back by displaying prominently on its front page a gruesome picture of bodies piled up in the Caracas morgue.
sentences.translation: 《国民报》在头版以一幅加拉加斯太平间堆放尸体的图片作为有力回击。
